reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Supporting enterprises in Chongqing, China to manage effective carbon reduction through emissions trading

description.narrative: The project is designed to draw upon UK experience and expertise to support Chongqing-based enterprises covered by China's national Emission Trading Scheme, so these enterprises establish their corporate-level carbon management system. In doing so, this is expected to generate opportunities for international businesses, including UK ones.

participating-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
